content: this is a summary of a legal text explaining the progress of a cause the text mentions a mediation session that took place on august 29 2019 at the headquarters of mediation body ma srl in nola the parties involved are referred to as mr c mrs r and an adherent the mediator appointed for the proceedings is avv p mrs r made a request for conciliation regarding a division matter with a declared value of €674333 the mediation meeting was initially scheduled for april 4 2019 but was postponed at the request of mrs r another attempt at conciliation was made on june 11 2019 and a conciliation agreement was reached between the parties the agreement requires a mediation indemnity payment of up to €500 and must be registered for tax purposes the lawyers involved avv l g avv c and avv r signed the minutes of the meeting the ombudsmandesignate confirms the conciliation and declares the proceedings closed mediation fees of €19419 including vat are to be paid by the parties through a bank transfer the text is signed and closed on august 29 2019 in nola
